1: Protect me, God, for I take refuge in you.\q
2: I say to Yahweh, "You are my Lord; my goodness is nothing apart from you.\q
3:
As for the holy people who are on the earth, they are noble people; all my delight is in them.

\q
4:
Their troubles will be increased, those who seek out other gods. I will not pour out drink offerings of blood to their gods\q or lift up their names with my lips.


\q
5: Yahweh, you are my chosen portion and my cup. You hold onto my destiny.\q
6:
Measuring lines have been laid for me in pleasant places; surely a pleasing inheritance is mine.

\q
7: I will bless Yahweh, who counsels me; even at night my mind instructs me.\q
8:
I set Yahweh before me at all times, so I will not be shaken from his right hand!

\q
9: Therefore my heart is glad; my glory is rejoicing. Surely I will live in security.\q
10:
For you will not abandon my soul to Sheol. You will not let your faithful one see the pit.

\q
11: You teach me the path of life; abundant joy resides in your presence; delights abide in your right hand forever!"
